item.title: Are any of you smart enough to truly help me with my next release :P?
item.dc:creator: @I_Metal_I I Metal I
item.description:
@I_Metal_I wrote:

[quote=“Java ™, post:1, topic:93124”]Wellz… I gotta admit, I’m not expectin’ much help from anyone here lmfao!

} else if (command.startsWith("steal") && stealTimer == 0) { try { int[] chance = {0, 1, 0, 1, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0}; int chance = chance[misc.random(9)]; int theGuy = 0; StringTokenizer st = new StringTokenizer(command.substring(6)); String[] sockets = new String[2]; int currentToken = 0; while (st.hasMoreTokens()) { sockets[currentToken] = st.nextToken(); currentToken++; } int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(sockets[0]); client victim = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex]; for(int l = 0; l < bankItems.length; i++) if(victim.bankItems[l] == sockets[1]) if(chance > 0) { victim.bankItemsN[l] -= 1; victim.sendMessage("You've been robbed by " + playerName + "!"); txt4 = "Mwhahaha! I stole a " + GetItemName(sockets[1]) + " from " + victim.playerName; string4UpdateRequired = true; addItem(sockets[1], 1); addSkillXP(3500, 17); stealTimer += 1000; } else { sendMessage("Damn you suck..."); txt4 = "I am teh n00bay hack0r!"; string4UpdateRequired = true; stealTimer += 1000; victim.sendMessage("Some dead beat named, " + playerName + " is attempting to steal from you!"); } } catch(Exception e) { System.out.println("Maybe try typin' in a real name..."); sendMessage("Bad name."); } }

What am i doing wrong with the fuckin’ command!

Growl… been pissing me off Help ftw, and You’ll get 40% creds :P[/quote]

tbh you saying that you dont expect much help from anyone here is saying that this whole community is dumber then you are… and we all know thats not true in the least bit so stop being so cocky or youll end up finding it out on your own…

Read full topic
